member.summary: Merges the subjcet of this email template with the specified data.

member.summary: Occurs when the smtp mail message for this email is about to be sent.

member.name: F:Olive.Services.Email.EmailService.Sent
member.summary: Occurs when the smtp mail message for this email is sent. Sender is the IEmailQueueItem instance that was sent.

member.name: F:Olive.Services.Email.EmailService.SendError
member.summary: Occurs when an exception happens when sending an email. Sender parameter will be the IEmailQueueItem instance that couldn't be sent.
